com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice.message
Class MessageImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice.message.MessageImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RPCMessageImpl, TextMessageImpl
public abstract class MessageImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message, java.lang.Cloneable

The implementation of the message object.

Parameters:
messageId - The unique id of this message.

retries - The number of retries of this message.
processedDate - The processed date.
user - The user responsible for this message.
principals - The list of principals.
from - The from url of the message.
messageType - The message type.
status - The status of the message.
